${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:HungerPower.NAME: Hunger
DESCRIPTIONS: When you deal unblocked damage, lose 1 Hunger and heal 1 HP.

${modID}:BloatPower.NAME: Bloat
DESCRIPTIONS: When gained, gain that much max HP. At the end of combat, lose any extra max HP.
